name: CustomJump
description: Remap jump input to any keyboard key.

jump-key-p2.name: Jump Key (Player 2)
jump-key-p2.description: Choose your preferred jump button for Player 2.

enable-jump-key-p2.name: Enable Player 2 Custom Key
enable-jump-key-p2.description: Toggle custom jump key input for Player 2.

stop-keybind-propagation.name: Stop Keybind Propagation
stop-keybind-propagation.description: If enabled, consume matched CustomJump keybind events before lower-priority listeners.
